Distributor: British Film Institute, Paramount Pictures, CIC-Taft Home Video
Synopsis: Set in postwar London, "Alfie" features Michael Caine as a chauffeur bent on promiscuity. After impregnating his girlfriend he takes off on vacation. He continues his life of womanizing, but he can't hide forever. A misfortune strikes and Alfie is forced to face the product of his ways.
Title: Alfie
